thread.title: Missed the northern lights? Here's a gallery from Thursday and tips for viewing Friday
thread.title_full: Missed the northern lights? Here's a gallery from Thursday and tips for viewing Friday

author: , The Des Moines Register
title: Missed the northern lights? Here's a gallery from Thursday and tips for viewing Friday
text: Missed the northern lights? Here's a gallery from Thursday and tips for viewing Friday The first evening of the [northern lights after a severe solar storm ](https://www.desmoinesregister.com/story/news/2024/10/10/aurora-borealis-forecast-iowa-noaa/75603437007/)painted the skies of rural Iowa shades of pink and light green Thursday night. If you were in places with heavy light pollution and missed the solar show, the Des Moines Register can catch you up on all the aurora shots taken around Iowa. How can I see the northern lights again? There is a chance to see the aurora again. On Friday, the aurora borealis could be visible from northern Iowa, but the likelihood isn't as strong as Thursday, according to the [NOAA](https://www.swpc.noaa.gov/products/aurora-viewline-tonight-and-tomorrow-night-experimental). Historically, the best time to see the lights is between 10 p.m. and 2 a.m. How to take photos of the aurora The best way to take photos of the northern lights on a smartphone is by adjusting the exposure time and enabling night mode, according to [USA TODAY](https://www.desmoinesregister.com/story/news/nation/2024/05/11/northern-lights-photos-smartphone-tips/73657106007/). More: [Iowans can see the Northern Lights tonight. Here's where they're forecast, how best to view](https://www.desmoinesregister.com/story/news/2024/10/10/aurora-borealis-forecast-iowa-noaa/75603437007/) Images of the northern lights over Iowa Northern lights in Iowa trend on social media Kate Kealey is a general assignment reporter for the Des Moines Register. Reach her at [kkealey@registermedia.com](mailto:kkealey@registermedia.com) or follow her on Twitter at [@Kkealey17](https://twitter.com/Kkealey17). This story was updated to add a video.
